title: cannot install sync client on rhel6
body:
this is on rhel 6.3, trying to install the sync client from this page: http://software.opensuse.org/download/package?project=isv:owncloud:devel&package=owncloud-client

the yum installer fails with this error:
setting up install process
resolving dependencies
--> running transaction check
---> package owncloud-client.x86_64 0:1.1.2-4.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: libocsync-plugin-owncloud >= 0.60.2 for package: owncloud-client-1.1.2-4.1.x86_64
--> processing dependency: libocsync.so.0()(64bit) for package: owncloud-client-1.1.2-4.1.x86_64
--> running transaction check
---> package libocsync0.x86_64 0:0.60.1-18.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: libiniparser.so.0()(64bit) for package: libocsync0-0.60.1-18.1.x86_64
---> package owncloud-client.x86_64 0:1.1.2-4.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: libocsync-plugin-owncloud >= 0.60.2 for package: owncloud-client-1.1.2-4.1.x86_64
--> running transaction check
---> package libiniparser.x86_64 0:3.1-3.3 will be installed
---> package owncloud-client.x86_64 0:1.1.2-4.1 will be installed
--> processing dependency: libocsync-plugin-owncloud >= 0.60.2 for package: owncloud-client-1.1.2-4.1.x86_64
--> finished dependency resolution
error: package: owncloud-client-1.1.2-4.1.x86_64 (isv_owncloud_devel)
           requires: libocsync-plugin-owncloud >= 0.60.2
           available: libocsync-plugin-owncloud-0.60.1-18.1.i686 (isv_owncloud_devel)
               libocsync-plugin-owncloud = 0.60.1-18.1
 you could try using --skip-broken to work around the problem
 you could try running: rpm -va --nofiles --nodigest
